remarks: Substituting ` y ` for ` x ` and then ` z ` for ` y ` is equivalent to substituting ` z ` for both ` x ` and ` y ` .  Copy of ~~? sbcom3OLD with a shortened proof. Keep this theorem for a while here because an external reference to it exists. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 8-Apr-2018.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 15-Sep-2018.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: wl-sbcom3 $p |- ( [ z / y ] [ y / x ] ph <-> [ z / x ] [ z / y ] ph ) $.
